timeline.message: Added react pages for fastqc images, overrepresented sequences, fastqc details. Added ajax controller. Added dto for FastQCDetails
Added overrepresented sequences and details retrieved from server

Removed tests no longer required. Added translations. Updated to remove page variables and rather get ids from the url. Updated FastQCCharts to display the fastqc images. Cleaned up SequenceFileController.
Added javadocs
Added missing translations. Removed page variables from template
Removed logging statement. Added badge with count of overrepresented sequences to link
Refactored constants into separate file. Added showZero to badge so it displays if the count is 0
Removed translations no longer required. Added info alert to fastqc component.
Added sequencefileajaxcontroller test. Updated display of sequences and percentages on the overrepresented sequences page.
Updated to use img tag. Removed extra alert.
Added requestmapping to view fastqc results when clicking on link on samples/ page. Updated to check if window.location.pathname matches the url
Updated percentage column to show 1 decimal place
Added tests. Added class names for tests
Updated CHANGELOG
Merged dev and fixed merge conflicts
Changed image column widths and added borders. Added comments. Fixed test

timeline.bodyText: Why are you not creating a UI service to handle this stuff?
timeline.author: joshsadam

timeline.message: Added UISequenceFileService. Added tests for service. Moved logic testing services into the service from the ajax controller. Updated sequence-files.js functions to throw an error if one is returned from the server. Removed customclassnames attribute from BasicList and instead added a props attribute to list items which contain the classname
Updated tests. Added fastqc images which are used by tests. Updated db xml file
Merged dev and fixed merge conflicts. Removed unused imports
Instead of erroring out on a page if an image is not found we return a byte array of 0 length
Reverted to throwing IOException if file can't be read

:recycle: Refactored the way the navigation system gets its information

Made better use of reach router Location and useParams to get details.
That should not have been comiited

Merge branch 'refactor-fastqc-page' into refactor-fastqc-page-NAVIGATION

# Conflicts:
#	src/main/webapp/resources/js/pages/sequence-files/components/FastQCCharts.jsx
Fixed merge conflict

Merge pull request #7 from phac-nml/refactor-fastqc-page-NAVIGATION

Refactor fastqc page navigation
Fixed issue with old 'summary' link
:construction: Initial context work
Images don't need to be in the context

Merge pull request #8 from phac-nml/refactor-fastqc-context

:construction: Initial context work
Added redirect from summary pages. Images not found/readable will not throw an exception and cause page to error but will instead return an empty byte array.
Added logger error messages for when reading an image file throws an exception. Updated fastqc page navigation to work in all cases
Removed unused import and added missing @param to javadoc
Refactored redirect
Fixed uri for sequencingruns
Merge branch 'development' into refactor-fastqc-page
